pages.text: Elixirs are magical concoctions created through alchemy in condensers. They are similar to potions. However, they are stackable up to sixteen bottles, not craftable with arrows, nor made into a splash or lingering variants.

Alchemy is the process of brewing elixirs in Condensers. Alchemy is done in condensers, requiring attached Retorts. Creating elixirs involves water, a glass bottle, ingredients (and optionally modifiers), and fuel to operate the condenser. Any furnace fuel should work.
